channel.title: How to make a server banner?
channel.description: i see some cool banner on server status and i just want to know how to make one.

item.title: How to make a server banner?
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“jose3121, post:2, topic:326525”]I use gimp (gimp.org) you can get Photo Shop which cost like 100 something (u.s.a dollars)
Also for Gimp i follow tutorials from hhtp://www.youtube.com/jxtutorials .[/quote]
Try using to download utorrent utorrent.com
then find at www.piratebay.org photoshop or gimp never pay for it if u don’t use it for your work!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a server banner?

item.title: How to make a server banner?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“jose3121, post:2, topic:326525”]I use gimp (gimp.org) you can get Photo Shop which cost like 100 something (u.s.a dollars)
Also for Gimp i follow tutorials from hhtp://www.youtube.com/jxtutorials .[/quote]It’s possible to download Photoshop for free online. You also need a sponsored server position to set a banner on the server status page.
